snippet: Former President George W. Bush puts the odds at “50-50” that his brother, Jeb, will become the third member of their immediate family to look to call the White House home.
abstract: Former Pres George W Bush, appearing on CBS Face the Nation broadcast, announces that his brother, former Florida Gov Jeb Bush, is considering whether to undertake presidential campaign in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Former President George W. Bush puts the odds at “50-50” that his brother, Jeb, will become the third member of their immediate family to look to call the White House home.

headline.main: Jeb Bush May Run for President, George W. Bush Says
headline.print_headline: Brother Says Jeb Bush on Fence About Running
